title: Huge SFX Pack: 200+ Sounds
description: Huge SFX pack 200+ Samples suitable for every game
longDescription:
This collection includes a lot of sounds to bring excitement into your game with a diverse array of most needed audio effects, including player movement, atmospheric backgrounds, UI, Events, and others.

Dive into a world of audio possibilities and enhance your game with this collection.


Check out how this sounds fit in games:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sc_7On9fd9U


Check out the showreel of each sound effect:

https://youtu.be/E_JfqO9F8sk
technicalDetails:
What's in the box?

There are 200+ sound effects in this pack:


  • Ambiances
  • User Interface
  • Collectibles,
  • Shop, and Doors
  • Various Defeat and Win Conditions
  • Jumping and Landing
  • Taking Damage
  • Dodging
  • Various footsteps on 5 surfaces
  • Grab,
  • Throw
  • Attack
  • Attack with Sword
  • Pistol reload, Gunshots, dry shots
  • Environment,
  • Campfire,
  • Bushes
  • Fire Magic



Number of Audio Waves: 219

Number of sound cues: 219

Sample rate/bit rate: 44,100 Hz

File format: WAV

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, they are marked with "loop"

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
